entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:17 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
